fields.name: guiLayers
fields.description: Contains the *extra* GUI layers. The current top layer stays in Minecraft#currentScreen, and the rest serve as a background for it.

methods.name: copyModelProperties
methods.description: Copies humanoid model properties from the original model to another, used for armor models

methods.name: fillNormal
methods.description: internal, relies on fixed format of FaceBakery
